platform.core.profile.category.notifications=Obavijesti notifications.filters.cancel=Otkaži notifications.filters.submit=Spremi notifications.filters.type.label=Tip filtra\: notifications.filters.type.hint=Kako bi se filtar trebao ponašati prema događaju na zadanoj lokaciji notifications.filters.location.label=Doseg filtra\: notifications.filters.location.hint=Na koji dio wikija bi filtar trebao imati utjecaja?
## Advanced filters options notifications.settings.filters.advanced=Napredne opcije filtriranja notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.hint=Ovi filtri se pretpostavljeno aktiviraju, možete ih isključiti pomoću gumba uz pojedini filtar. notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.name=Ime filtra notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.description=Opis notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.toggle=Uključi/isključi notifications.filters.advanced.modal.close=Zatvori
## Filters names notifications.filters.name.systemUserNotificationFilter=Sistemski filter notifications.filters.description.systemUserNotificationFilter=Sakrij obavijesti sistemskog korisnika ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.ownEventsNotificationFilter=Own Events Filter ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.ownEventsNotificationFilter=Hide notifications about your own activity ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.eventReadAlertFilter=Read Event Filter (Alert) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.eventReadAlertFilter=Hide notifications that you have marked as read ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.eventReadEmailFilter=Read Event Filter (Email) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.eventReadEmailFilter=Hide notifications that you have marked as read ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=Minor Event (Alert) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=Hide notifications concerning minor changes on pages ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=Minor Event (Email) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=Hide notifications concerning minor changes on pages

Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.hint=An email is sent to you regularly with a summary of what happened on the wiki ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.title=Email Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency=Email Frequency ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency.hint=Choose how often you want to receive an email with the summary of what happened on the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.diffType.hint=Select the level of detail you want to receive about all the changes in the email. notifications.settings.saving=Vaše postavke se pohranjuju... notifications.settings.saved=Spremljeno\! notifications.settings.savingfailed=Spremanje vaših postavki nije uspjelo notifications.settings.filters=Filtri ({0}) notifications.settings.addFilter=Dodaj filtar notifications.settings.errorFilterWiki=Greška\: morate odabrati wiki, ne stranicu ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences=Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences.hint=Capture what events are happening and deliver them in the stream or by email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.title=Applications ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.hint=This is the list of applications that can send notifications. You can enable or disable any of them. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.appName=Name ### Missing: notifications.settings.events=Events ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.title=Watched Pages ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode=Automatic page watching ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode.hint=Decide if you wish to watch a page after you have worked on it ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.disabled=The watched entities are disabled.
